transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Hello? Ji kya boliye?
Customer: Haan ji, main Nitin baat kar raha hoon. Abhi aap se baat hui thi na?
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Haan ji ji. Bataiye ab kya ho raha hai? Actually us samay lag ho raha tha na, to main dhang se baat nahi kar paya tha aap se.
Executive: Haan ji, bataiye mam.
Customer: To number main bol rahi hoon. Sir, aap unse baat kar lijiye, wo bahut badtameezi kar rahe hain.
Executive: Achcha, wo aapke paas direct inquiries aayi hai ya direct call aayi hai ya by lead aapne confirm kari hai?
Customer: Direct call aayi hai, call aayi hai sir direct.
Executive: Ek minute rukiye, ek minute rukiye.

Executive: Ye last mein mam 967 hai uska number?
Customer: Nahi, ek minute bata rahe hain.
Executive: To matlab kis, mam kis bihaf pe aapko badtameezi kar raha tha? Hain?
Customer: 67 hai last mein number.
Executive: 967 na, wahi main bol raha hoon.
Customer: Haan ji ji ji.
Executive: To aap ye kis bihaf pe aapko badtameezi kar raha hai?
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Jis bande ne to aapko bahut baar call kari hai, teen char baar kari hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Aap ye kis bihaf pe bol raha hai? Matlab aapne kuch bola tha ya khud isne bola?
Customer: Nahi, pehle wo bole hain.
Executive: Matlab kya, matlab kya bol raha tha?
Customer: Service maang rahe the, to hum bole ki kaun si machine ka chahiye, to bol raha hai samajh jao, samajh jao.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Wahi hum chilla chilla ke bole kaun si machine ka chahiye, to badtameezi kar rahe the.
Executive: Okay, koi nahi aap mujhe is type ka number de dijiye, main ek baar isse baat kar leta hoon. Plus dusri mujhe na ye jaanna tha ki aapne wo, aapne na customer care pe call kiya tha. Jaise 9696 pe jab koi call karta hai na IndiaMART ke, to yaha pe hamara na concern aapke account manager ke upar open ho jata hai. To hame kya hai ki na aapko ek concern ke liye aapke mail pe na feedback jata hai. Theek hai, aap pehle to mujhe iska number de dijiye, pehle main ispe call le leta hoon, kya dikkat aa rahi hai.
Customer: Number bol ke?
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: 82
Executive: Theek hai, 82
Customer: 10
Executive: 10
Customer: 88
Executive: 88
Customer: 39
Executive: 3967. Kya naam tha iska?
Customer: Munna Yadav naam dikha raha tha Truecaller pe.
Executive: Achcha, Munna Yadav, ek minute rukiye. Ji. Aur mam ek na main aapko ek rai deta hoon, agar is bande ka dobara call aata hai na aapke paas, hmm.
Executive: To aap na kya karna, chalti call mein hash one daba dena.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Chalti call mein aap hash one daba doge to ye IndiaMART se block ho jayega. Kyunki aap jo keh rahe ho na block karwa do ise, to block to main isko karwa sakta hoon but block wo aapke through hi hoga.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Matlab jab aapke paas dobara call aaye na, to aap isko chalti call mein hash one daba dena.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai, isse ye block ho jayega IndiaMART se aur fir ye aage kisi ko call nahi kar payega IndiaMART se. Theek hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai, ek ye aur dusra, ek minute rukiye. Line pe rahiye, main aapko na
Executive: IndiaMART ke jo mam aapki mail ID upload hai, uska access aapke paas hai?
Customer: Nahi, wo sir se baat karna padega uske liye.
Executive: Ek minute rukiye fir. Line pe rahiye mam. Actually aapne IndiaMART ke customer care pe jab koi call karta hai na, to yaha pe concern open hota hai ki aapne thoda sa aapko problem. Aap na mam mera personal number le lijiye ek to.
Customer: Boliye.
Executive: Haan, ek minute rukiye.
Executive: Haan, likhiye mam.
Customer: Boliye.
Executive: 84
Customer: 34
Executive: 84 mam, 84 hai starting mein.
Customer: 84
Executive: Haan, 47
Customer: 47
Executive: 57
Customer: 57
Executive: 34
Customer: 34
Executive: 31
Customer: 31
Executive: Mera good name hai mam Nitin Lamba karke hai, main aapka account manager hoon, theek hai? Abhi jo call chal rahi hai this is the DID number. Actually kya hota hai jab client ko kisi ko aapka account manager ka number yaad nahi hota na, to wo ye matlab jo dashboard page pe aap dekhenge to waha niche mera yahi number likha hoga. But aapko jaise kabhi kya hota hai Saturday Sunday hamara organization close hota hai, to on the bihaf of that aapko kabhi koi problem ya kuch jaise abhi for example ye Sunday ko case hua hota aapke sath, to aap kisko call karte, aapko nahi pata hota. To aap directly DID pe matlab customer care pe call karte to support nahi milta us samay. To is chakkar mein IndiaMART ne kya hai ye aapko maine isme apna personal number share kar diya ki aapko koi bhi dikkat hoti hai, koi bhi pareshani hoti hai, aap mujhe is number pe reach kar lenge. Theek hai mam? Aur abhi main aapko dekho maine aapko ek suggestion de diya, aapka jo doubt tha ye banda aap se matlab badtameezi kar raha tha, ye number pe main abhi call le raha hoon. Dusri cheez ye hai aapke agar ye dobara call karta hai is number se, aapko kya karna hai hash one daba dena hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai, to ye automatically IndiaMART ke portal se block ho jayega.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai, to main yaha se fir aapka concern close kar doon?
Customer: Theek hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai, main abhi aapka yaha se concern close ja raha hoon, kar raha hoon, to aapke na mail pe feedback jayega to aap please ek baar feedback de dena. Baki main abhi isse pehle baat kar raha hoon, ye bande ne aap se matlab kya bola kya tha, main puchunga sir requirements aapko jab nahi chahiye thi to aapne kyu matlab aise wo kara. Ek baar main pura clarify kar leta hoon. Baki aap se to kuch matlab aur kuch to nahi bola na, bas yahi aapne machine related hi baat ki thi. Theek hai, theek hai, bilkul. Fir main abhi aapko update deta hoon thodi der mein. Theek hai mam?
Customer: Theek hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai, thank you mam.
Customer: Aap jis vyakti se baat
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received a rude call from a user.

- Wants to block the caller.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to call the user.

- Provided a way to block the caller.

- Shared his personal number for assistance.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the user.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- spam calls, block, personal number, customer care
